name: BANG BANG (MiguelMMacedo)
description:
A reaction time based game with a western theme developed in tic80 for RetroJam Porto 2021

You're a lonely man on a wild and uncharacteristic adventure in the wild west. Your family was murdered by a lefty cowboy that goes by the name of "The Silver Rider". You try to avenge them, but first you have go through his henchmen.

Source code: https://github.com/JoaoGarrido/RetroJam_Nabos
